Class Building

  • java.lang.Object
    • greenfoot.Actor
      • Building
  • public abstract class Building
extends greenfoot.Actor
    Buildings are Greenfoot Actors that remain stationary on the battlefield. They have different uses, such as training troops, attacking other buildings, defending their territory, or building more buildings. Each building has its own health. When its health reaches zero, the building will explode and be destroyed.
    Version:
    April 27, 2020
    Author:
    Daniel Wei & Owen Zhu
